alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 9:47AM CST until January 28 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional localized snow accumulations of up to three to four inches where the heaviest snow occurs. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous travel conditions in heaviest snow with rapidly changing conditions over short distances. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If travel cannot be postponed, plan for significantly longer travel times in areas impacted by the most intense snowfall.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
